text: Ezɨ Joap amizir nɨghnɨzir aghuiba itim bagha uan ingangarir gumazir mam amadazɨ, a ghua Tekoan nguibamɨn a inigha ize. Ezɨ Joap kamaghɨn a mɨgei, “Nɨ kamaghɨn damuasa kɨ ifonge, nɨ ifar mati gumazim aremezɨ nɨ aghuimazimɨn iti moghɨn ikɨ. Nɨ aghuimazir korotiabar aghuigh, egh borem uan mɨkarzim daghuan markɨ. Nɨ mati gumazim aremezɨ nɨ dughiar ruarimɨn a gɨbua iti moghɨn ikɨ.
